item.title: How to set a X window visible or invisible using Xlib
item.description: bool m_visible; Display* m_display; Window m_window; void setVisible(bool visible) { if (visible == m_visible) return; if (visible) XMapWindow(m_display, m_window); else XUnmapWindow(m_display, m_window); m_visible = visible; }
